clean.description: Remove the dist directory before building the project.

report.description: Generate report.html to help analyze bundle content.

reportJson.description: Generate report.json to help analyze bundle content.

skipPlugins.description: Comma-separated list of plugin names to skip for this run.

entry.description: The full path for the main entry point to your library, relative to the current workspace.

tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the current workspace.

inlineVue.description: Include the Vue module in the final bundle of library.

formats.description: List of output formats for library builds.

extract.description: Whether to extract CSS in your components into a standalone CSS files (instead of inlined in JavaScript and injected dynamically).

sourceMap.description: Whether to enable source maps for CSS. Setting this to true may affect build performance.

transpileDependencies.description: By default babel-loader ignores all files inside node_modules. If you want to explicitly transpile a dependency with Babel, you can list it in this option.
